snippet: The prime ministers of Serbia and Albania pledged Monday to put their differences aside and focus on their mutual desire to join the European Union — but the good feelings did not last until the end of their joint news conference.
lead_paragraph: The prime ministers of Serbia and Albania pledged Monday to put their differences aside and focus on their mutual desire to join the European Union — but the good feelings did not last until the end of their joint news conference.

headline.main: Serbia: Visit by Albania’s Premier Fails to Reduce Tensions
headline.print_headline: Serbia: Visit by Albania’s Premier Fails to Reduce Tensions
